title: willing to trade 2 t206 drum backs for 1...
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: willing to trade 2 t206 drum backs for 1...
posts.post_content:
Finding the seymour throwing drum back is proving to be tougher than I thought.... I know 1 was sold in the cardtarget auction a few years back... but the buyer sold it and I cant find it... if you own the seymour drum back... I am willing to trade 2 Drum backs that I have for your 1 seymour drum back.

If you know who owns it please pass this offer along.. 

Thanks
Jamie
